About Me

Knowledgeable in the design, development, integration and delivery of web applications and analysis.

BIO

Full-stack developer experienced in deploying and building websites from wireframe to production. Out-of-the-box thinker who champions innovative solutions to complex business problems through emerging technologies and business models. Known as an excellent communicator who effectively manages key partnerships. Recognized for cross-functional expertise in project management, market research/analysis, strategic planning, and data analysis.

First project

Javascript Game

Built an interactive game using JavaScript/JQuery (HTML/CSS)

Second project

Full Stack Project

Built a fullstack app for book-lovers using Google API. The app allows users to search and save favorite books to their personal accounts (HTML/CSS/EJS/Node and Express/PostgreSQL)

Third project

Full Stack Project

Built a fullstack app that is similar to a market place which allows users to buy and sell items. Used Google Maps API to show the location of the seller for each of the items on the market place (HTML/ CSS/Node and Express/PostgreSQL/React)

Fourth project

Full Stack project

Built a supervised machine learning model that predicts stock prices based on volatility (Python/Pandas/Scikit Learn/Matplot lib/Seaborn/Quandl API)
